Gale.help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

O2_Boost.help: Saturates the air around a targeted ally with rich oxygen, healing their wounds. The O2 Boost can protect a targeted ally from Sleep, Stun and Endurance Drain effects as well as increase perception. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Fast
O2_Boost.targetHelp: The O2 Boost has improved your resistance to Sleep, Stun and Endurance Drain effects.

messages.attackerHit: {PlayerDest} is healed for {Damage} points of damage and is protected from Sleep and Disorientation.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage and protect you from Sleep and Disorientation.

Snow_Storm.help: While active, the chill from this Snow Storm can dramatically Slow the attack and movement speed of the target and all nearby foes. The torrent winds of the Snow Storm are enough to bring down flying foes. Recharge: Slow
Snow_Storm.targetHelp: Your attack rate and running speed have been reduced by the Snow Storm. The Torrent winds are hindering your ability to Fly.
Snow_Storm.attackerHit: You Slow the attack and movement speed of all nearby foes with your {PowerName}.

Steamy_Mist.help: Your mastery of the elements allows you to hide yourself and all nearby allies within a Steamy Mist. Steamy Mist makes you and your allies harder to see and increases your Defense bonus to all attacks, while reducing Fire, Cold, and Energy damage, as well as your Foes ability to Confuse you. You cannot use any other Concealment type powers while using Steamy Mist. Recharge: Slow
Steamy_Mist.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Stealth, +DEF(All), +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Confuse)
Steamy_Mist.targetHelp: The Steamy Mist is making you more difficult to detect. This increases your Defense and gives you some resistance to Fire, Cold, Energy and Confuse.

Fog.help: Summons Freezing Rain at a targeted location. Freezing Rain deals minimal Cold damage to anything that passes through the storm. It also Slows the affected foes and severely reduces their Defense and resistance to damage. Many foes may even slip and fall trying to escape the storm. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Fog.targetHelp: The Freezing Rain is causing cold damage to you and has reduced your damage potential, resistance, attack rate and running speed.

Hurricane.help: You can summon a Hurricane. The wind and rain from this massive storm reduce the range and chance to hit of nearby foes. The massive winds of this storm continuously force foes away from you. Recharge: Slow
Hurricane.targetHelp: Hurricane Force winds are reducing the visual range and chance to hit of all enemies around the Storm Summoner!
Hurricane.attackerHit: You reduce the range and chance to hit of all nearby foes with your {PowerName}.
Hurricane.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your range and chance to hit with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Thunder_Clap.help: You can call forth a tremendous Thunder Clap that will Disorient most foes in a large area around you. Recharge: Slow
Thunder_Clap.targetHelp: The Thunder Clap has left you Disoriented.

Tornado.help: Conjures up a funnel cloud at a targeted location. The Tornado will chase down your foes, tossing them into the air and hurling them great distances. The victims are left Disoriented and with reduced Defense. The Tornado is a menacing sight, and can even cause panic among your foes. Recharge: Long
Tornado.shortHelp: Summon Tornado: PBAoE Minor DAM (Smash), Foe Knockback, Fear, Disorient
Tornado.targetHelp: You have been Disoriented by the Tornado.

Lightning_Storm.help: You can create a massive Lightning Storm that will strike any foe that approaches you. Lightning from this storm can knock down and damage all nearby foes, and can even instill panic. Lightning bolts will continue to fall as long as the storm remains. Recharge: Long
Lightning_Storm.shortHelp: Create Storm: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), Foe -End
